question:
The central Consumer Protection Authority will have which of the following powers?
1. The power to recall goods or withdrawal of services that are “dangerous, hazardous or unsafe.
2. The power to pass an order for refund of the prices of goods or services so recalled to purchasers of such goods or services.
3. Power of discontinuation of practices which are unfair and prejudicial to consumer’s interest.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The central Consumer Protection Authority will have the following powers: (1) The power to recall goods or withdrawal of services that are “dangerous, hazardous or unsafe, (2) The power to pass an order for refund of the prices of goods or services so recalled to purchasers of such goods or services and (3) Power of discontinuation of practices which are unfair and prejudicial to consumer’s interest.
